articles.author: Leah Sarnoff, Kenton Gewecke
articles.title: 70 million Americans under severe weather threat from Northeast to Midwest - ABC News
articles.description: From Sunday through Tuesday, hail, winds and a few tornados are possible.
articles.content:
Severe weather is projected to impact 70 million Americans from the Northeast Sunday through to Tuesday in the Midwest.
NOAA's Storm Prediction Center has issued an enhanced risk outlook for the mul… [+1618 chars]
